mapper.select: SELECT car_id, name, type, fuel, consumption, picture FROM car
SELECT car_id, name, type, fuel, consumption, picture FROM car WHERE car_id = #{carId}
SELECT car_id, name, type, fuel, consumption, picture FROM car WHERE upper(name) like upper(#{carName})
SELECT car_id, name, type, fuel, consumption, picture FROM car WHERE upper(type) like upper(#{carType})
SELECT car_id, name, type, fuel, consumption, picture FROM car WHERE upper(fuel) like upper(#{carFuelType})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (name, type, fuel, consumption, picture) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{fuelType}, #{consumption}, #{picture})
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET (name, type, fuel, consumption, picture) = (#{name}, #{type}, #{fuelType}, #{consumption}, #{picture}) WHERE car_id = #{carId}
